category: General Assembly of Representatives and Board of Directors Regulations/Article 18 (Preparation of minutes)
contents: Article 18 (Preparation of minutes) Regarding the proceedings of the general meeting, minutes shall be prepared and the following matters shall be written. 1. Date and time of the general meeting 2. Location of the general meeting 3. Number of members present 4. Summary of proceedings 5. Result of proceedings 6. Closing
